events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
Ticket has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on customer request keywords.
Agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for your jacket. I’d be happy to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been opened or used?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket hasn’t been worn, just tried on once and tags are still attached.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process as soon as we receive the returned jacket. Instructions for the return shipping label will follow.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if the refund has been credited to your account and if you are satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you for the excellent support and fast handling of my request!
We are glad to hear that everything is resolved. Closing the case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
